titles.title: I Will Exalt You Oh Lord

comments.comment:
chorus (ending/2?)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
Your love oh Lord
It reaches to the heavens
Your faithfulness
It reaches to the sky

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Your righteousness
Is like the mighty mountains
How priceless
Is your faithful love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will exalt you oh Lord
I will exalt you oh Lord
Praise your holy name
That my heart may sing to you
I will exalt you oh Lord

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Your name oh Lord
It is a mighty tower
Your glory
It covers all the earth

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
In your hands alone
Are strength and power
All praise be
To your glorious name

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
We will exalt you oh Lord
We will exalt you oh Lord
Praise your holy name
That our hearts may sing to you
We will exalt you oh Lord
